name: Treasure Checklist
description: Adds a checklist of your Treasure Room progress

misc-rewards.name: Misc. rewards
misc-rewards.description: Displays other rewards (like Colors and Death effects) of the treasure room chests.

disable-checkmark.name: Disable checkmark
disable-checkmark.description: Icons aren't greyed out and displayed without the checkmark. If you want to see all the designs.
